CatDescriptText: Cutline of related article published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, June 6, 1959, pg. 6 reads: " "A Home Show Named Success" must be the appropriate label tagged to the ninth annual Courier Home Service Fair, held at the massive Syria Mosque last Tuesday, Wednesday and Thursday nights...The exhibitors and participants worked enthusiastically from their national and local booths to accommodate the happy homemakers..."
TitMainTitle: Display kitchen with Westinghouse appliances, in Syria Mosque for the 1959 Pittsburgh Courier Home Service Fair
CatSubject_tab: Trade shows--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Signs--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Advertising--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Syria Mosque (Pittsburgh, Pa.)Pittsburgh Courier Home Service Fair.
